name: Between Worlds (abocado)
description:
Between Worlds is a puzzle game where you must switch between two players in two different rooms to solve the puzzles and reach the red platforms with both players. 

The music is : 

NOTE: Unity crashed when it was building the game, so the version on this page lacks some features which should be included like showing the controls and some last graphic settings. That's also the reason why the game lacks a WebGL-Version and the music doesn't play in the Tutorial level. I will add those after the jam is over.

Tutorial:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - PickUp/Drop Cube

Right Mouse Button - Change between players

Space - Jump

Reach red platforms (you can see them on the cover image) with both players . You must wait 3 seconds

Esc-Main Menu

V-Toggle Fullscreen(only works in level, not Main Menu)

R - Reload
